reviews.review_msg: A pretty caring guy, but his teaching style isn't the best. He solves questions for the whole lecture and sometimes he doesn't even understand the questions he assigns, and then gets super confused. You should already enjoy physics if you want to succeed in this class. The midterms are decently difficult. The homework might take long though

Levon's kind & funny, but his deliverance with PHYS125 wasn't great. He was confused with some topics, and he sometimes came to lectures ill-prepared. So his lectures weren't so useful. But he'd make time outside of class to help, and his grading was VERY lenient. I'm sure he's a good prof with other courses, but 125 wasn't a strong point for him.
More prof's need to be like him. most profs are great people and, not-so great at teaching. Levon is a great person and a great prof.
Good prof, best of all the professors i've had. He's caring, his midterms are easy. good prof.

Great prof. Somewhat dry lectures and can be a bit hard to follow, but he always stops and begs the class to interrupt if there is any confusion.  His assignments are tough but they're good prep work for the exams and go beyond what he'd expect of you on a test. Fair tests and very kind outside of class, especially if he sees you work for it.

Physics labs were marked by the TA. The professor surveyed the class and does pre-lecture. Feel free to ask the TA's and the prof questions! He seems nice, and interested in the subject. The practical final exam wasn't too hard, just make sure you have a detailed lab notebook and pay attention to every experiment, as well as the practice exam.
Best I ever had!!! Armenian teacher at SFU:) great!
the best prof I had at SFU
should somehow make classes more interesting.

My class was one of the first classes Levon taught at SFU. Although sometimes he minimizes his explanation and let Math do the job, which could be difficult sometimes. He sometimes follow the lecture notes too mechanically. However, he's always available for help, a very nice prof. I find him quite approachable, and that helps a lot.
